TopicTitle: Darker shade theme, please (My eyes. They burn.)

Articles.Content:
I'm by no means on the up and up with forum code, but I do know that the capability of having user specific forum themes (colors of titlebars/backgrounds/etc) goes back to the early 2000s.
Why is our only option eye-sight scourging white?

Is personal settings for a milder shade to the format an option or soon to be one?
